titleStmt.title: The names of herbes in Greke, Latin, Englishe, Duche [and] Frenche with the commune names that herbaries and apotecaries vse. Gathered by William Turner.
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [S. Mierdman for] John Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a litle aboue Holbourne Conduite,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name and publication date from STC.
Imperfect; lacks leaves H1 and H3.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
